channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+6050] 4 Awkward Moments in Facebook "Likes"
[+3048] An Unbelievable Display Of Racism, Extremism Against Obama
item.description: Socialist, Nazi, Muslim, Anti-Christ, Non-Christian, Hitler, Baby Killer. Those are just some of the choice descriptions the far-right extremists interviewed on camera Saturday (many who are clearly uneducated) uttered when discussing President Barack Obama. This nine minute documentary is unreal.

item.title: [+2300] What kind of bow is she using?

[+1636] Jon Stewart Returns from Hiatus, Destroys Wilson, Glenn Beck
item.description: The Daily Show returned last night. Thank you, Jeebus.

item.title: [+1447] Cyanide and Happiness: IPHONE POWER
item.description: Bear attack? There's an app for that.

item.title: [+1428] Study: Medical Marijuana is a Safe & Effective Medicine
item.description: In the landmark article, published in the Journal of Opioid Management, University of Washington researcher Sunil Aggarwal and colleagues document no fewer than 33 controlled clinical trials -- published over a 38-year period from 1971 to 2009 -- confirming that marijuana is a safe, effective medicine for specific medical conditions.

item.title: [+1350] Girl Throws Foul Ball Back [Video]
item.description: Jason Werth hits foul ball. Girl throws foul ball back after dad makes catch at the phillies game 9/15/09.

item.title: [+1335] Thank you Mario! [PIC]
item.description: Problem is, Mario is a douchebag.

item.title: [+1269] If Video Games Were Realistic
item.description: A little realism would make some games way more awesome. Others, not so much. We asked you to show us what would happen if video game makers started adding a little realism to their games. The winner is below, but first the runners up.

item.title: [+1216] The Evolution of Game Controllers (illustrated)
item.description: How console game controllers have evolved through time: starting from Tandy and ending at the Wii mote.

item.title: [+1077] Constitutional Amendment to Criminalize Birth Control
item.description: Yes, the state that brought you Bush v. Gore, the sex offender colony under the bridge, and the shoot-first-ask-questions-later legislation known as the "Stand Your Ground Law" has another idea up its sleeve. And this one's for the ladies.

item.title: [+1074] Jimmy Carter: Wilson's Outburst 'Based On Racism'
item.description: ATLANTA — Former President Jimmy Carter says Congressman Joe Wilson's outburst to President Barack Obama last week was an act "based on racism." Carter says Wilson's comment was part of an "inherent feeling" of some in this country who feel that a black man should not be president.

item.title: [+1062] OMG No Way! [Pic]

item.description: A case in Pittsburgh argues for the First Amendment right to the middle finger and against

item.title: [+783] Smashing Pumpkins giving next 44-song album away for free!
item.description: Harking back to the release of Machina II back in 2000, The Smashing Pumpkins announced today that their next album will be giving away completely for free as it is recorded. The album is said to contain 44 tracks and the theme will be based around Tarot Cards.

item.title: [+761] Zero Punctuation: Batman Arkham Asylum
item.description: This week, Zero Punctuation reviews Batman Arkham Asylum.

item.title: [+713] Google Releases Chrome Version 3
item.description: Just two weeks after Google Chrome's birthday, the search engine giant has unleashed Google ChromeGoogle Chrome version 3. It's faster, supports HTML5, and

item.title: [+632] 50 Cent: Piracy Is A Part Of The Marketing
item.description: 50 cent sees piracy as a part of the marketing of a musician, because "the people who didn't purchase the material, they end up at the concert." He says that people can fall in love with the music either way, and then they'll go to concerts. He notes that you can't stop piracy either way, so why try to fight it?

item.title: [+601] 5 Popular Zombie Survival Tactics (That Will Get You Killed)
item.description: You've got the exact same essential plan as everybody else: go raid the gun store, get out of the cities as fast as possible, find a sturdy base to fortify and hole up in, use a melee weapon whenever possible to conserve ammo and--if the worst does come to pass and you find yourself facing down a crowd of the undead--take your time, aim carefully a
